sourcesContent:
<template>
    <el-dialog :visible.sync="visible" :title="title" width="640px">
        <el-form :model="ruleForm" :rules="rules" ref="ruleForm" label-width="150px" class="demo-ruleForm">
            <el-form-item label="username" prop="username">
                <el-input v-model="ruleForm.username" placeholder="please enter a username"></el-input>
            </el-form-item>
            <el-form-item label="age" prop="age">
                <el-input v-model="ruleForm.age" placeholder="please enter your age"></el-input>
            </el-form-item>
            <el-form-item label="gender" prop="gender">
                <el-select style="width: 150px;" v-model="ruleForm.gender" placeholder="gender">
                    <el-option style="width: 150px;" v-for="item in genders" :key="item.value" :label="item.label"
                        :value="item.value">
                    </el-option>
                </el-select>
            </el-form-item>
            <el-form-item label="birthDate" prop="birthDate">
                <el-date-picker style="width: 200px;" v-model="ruleForm.birthDate" type="date"
                    placeholder="birthDate"></el-date-picker>
            </el-form-item>
            <el-form-item label="password" prop="password">
                <el-input type="password" v-model="ruleForm.password" placeholder="please enter a password"></el-input>
            </el-form-item>
            <el-form-item label="check password" prop="checkPass">
                <el-input type="password" v-model="ruleForm.checkPass"
                    placeholder="please enter the password again"></el-input>
            </el-form-item>
            <el-form-item label="security ask" prop="securityAsk">
                <el-select v-model="ruleForm.securityAsk" placeholder="choose a security ask">
                    <el-option v-for="item in securityAnses" :key="item.value" :label="item.label" :value="item.value">
                    </el-option>
                </el-select>
            </el-form-item>
            <el-form-item label="security ans" prop="securityAns">
                <el-input v-model="ruleForm.securityAns"
                    placeholder="please enter the securityAns of security ask"></el-input>
            </el-form-item>
            <el-form-item label="phone" prop="phone">
                <el-input v-model="ruleForm.phone" placeholder="please enter your phone"></el-input>
            </el-form-item>
            <el-form-item label="qq" prop="qq">
                <el-input v-model="ruleForm.qq" placeholder="please enter your qq"></el-input>
            </el-form-item>
            <el-form-item label="invite" prop="invite">
                <el-input v-model="ruleForm.invite" placeholder="please enter your invite"></el-input>
            </el-form-item>
            <el-form-item>
                <el-button type="primary" @click="submitForm('form')">Register</el-button>
            </el-form-item>
        </el-form>
    </el-dialog>
</template>

<script>

import { EventBus } from '@/utils/event-bus';
import request from "@/utils/request";

export default {
    data() {
        var validatePass = (rule, value, callback) => {
            if (value === '') {
                callback(new Error('please enter a password'));
            } else {
                if (this.ruleForm.checkPass !== '') {
                    this.$refs.ruleForm.validateField('checkPass');
                }
                callback();
            }
        };
        var validatePass2 = (rule, value, callback) => {
            if (value === '') {
                callback(new Error('please enter the password again'));
            } else if (value !== this.ruleForm.password) {
                callback(new Error('the passwords are different!'));
            } else {
                callback();
            }
        }
        return {
            visible: false,
            title: 'Register',
            securityAnses: [{
                value: '1',
                label: 'your father\'s name'
            }, {
                value: '2',
                label: 'your mother\'s name'
            }],
            genders: [{
                value: '1',
                label: 'male'
            }, {
                value: '2',
                label: 'female'
            }],
            ruleForm: {
                username: '',
                password: '',
                checkPass: '',
                age: '',
                gender: '',
                birthDate: '',
                email: '',
                emailCode: '',
                securityAsk: '',
                securityAns: '',
                phone: '',
                qq: '',
                invite: '',
            },
          form: {
            username: '',
            password: '',
            age: '',
            gender: '',
            birthDate: '',
            email: '',
            emailCode: '',
            securityAsk: '',
            securityAns: '',
            phone: '',
            qq: '',
            invite: '',
          },
            rules: {
                username: [
                    { required: true, message: 'please enter a username', trigger: 'blur' },
                    { min: 1, max: 7, message: '1-7 letters', trigger: 'blur' }
                ],
                password: [
                    { required: true, validator: validatePass, trigger: 'blur' }
                ],
                checkPass: [
                    { required: true, validator: validatePass2, trigger: 'blur' }
                ],
                age: [
                    { required: true, },
                ],
                gender: [
                    { required: true, },
                ],
                birthDate: [
                    { required: true, },
                ],
                email: [
                    { required: true, },
                ],
                emailCode: [
                    { required: true, },
                ],
                securityAsk: [
                    { required: true, message: 'choose a security ask', trigger: 'change' }
                ],
                securityAns: [
                    { required: true, message: 'please enter the security ans', trigger: 'blur' },
                ],
            }
        };
    },
    methods: {
        show() {
            this.visible = true;
            this.resetForm('ruleForm');
        },
        hide() {
            this.visible = false;
        },
        goToLoginDialog() {
            this.hide();
            EventBus.$emit('show-login-dialog');
        },

        async submitForm(formName) {
          this.form = this.ruleForm,
            this.$refs[formName].validate((valid) => {
                if (valid) {
                    request.post('/log/register', this.form)
                        .then((response) => {
                            const { code, msg, data } = response.data;
                            if (code === 1) {
                                // 请求成功  
                                console.log('请求成功:', msg);
                                console.log('数据:', data);  
                                alert(msg);
                                this.goToLoginDialog();
                            } else if (code === 0) {
                                // 请求失败  
                                console.error('请求失败:', msg);
                                alert(msg);
                            } else {
                                // 未知的响应码  
                                console.error('未知的响应码:', code, msg);
                            }
                        })
                        .catch((error) => {
                            // 处理网络错误或请求未发送成功的情况  
                            if (error.response) {
                                // 请求已发出，但服务器响应的状态码不在 2xx 范围内  
                                console.error('服务器响应错误:', error.response.data);
                                console.error('状态码:', error.response.status);
                            } else if (error.request) {
                                // 请求已发出，但没有收到响应  
                                console.error('请求错误:', error.request);
                            } else {
                                // 发生了其他错误（例如，在设置请求时出错）  
                                console.error('发生错误:', error.msg);
                            }
                        });
                } else {
                    console.log('不合法的表单');
                    return false;
                }
            });
        },
        resetForm(formName) {
            this.$refs[formName].resetFields();
        }
    }
}
</script>

<style>
.el-row {
    margin-bottom: 20px;

    &:last-child {
        margin-bottom: 0;
    }
}

.el-col {
    border-radius: 4px;
}

.bg-purple-dark {
    background: #99a9bf;
}

.bg-purple {
    background: #d3dce6;
}

.bg-purple-light {
    background: #e5e9f2;
}

.grid-content {
    border-radius: 4px;
    min-height: 36px;
}

.row-bg {
    padding: 10px 0;
    background-color: #f9fafc;
}
